item.title: 股票大涨后，英伟达首席执行官薪酬跃升至 5000 万美元
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）在 2025 财年跃升 46%，达到近 5000 万美元，因为他共同创立的公司成为人工智能消费热潮的最大受益者。【原文：The pay package of Nvidia Corp. Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang jumped 46% to nearly $50 million in fiscal 2025 after the company he co-founded became the top beneficiary of an artificial intelligence spending boom.】

item.description:
该公司的突然崛起说明，尽管华盛顿竭力放缓中国工业的发展，但中国的工业仍在蓬勃发展。【原文：

item.title: Arbor Realty 在其 2022 年以来的首笔 CLO 交易中捆绑租赁贷款
item.description: Arbor Realty Trust Inc. 三年来首次重返证券化市场，希望将公寓出租物业抵押贷款打包。【原文：Arbor Realty Trust Inc. is returning to securitization markets for the first time in three years as it looks to package up loans secured by apartment rental properties.】

item.title: 中国生育率计划提振新西兰绩优股
item.description: 中国提高出生率的计划帮助 a2 牛奶公司的股票成为新西兰今年涨幅最大的股票。【原文：China’s plans to lift its birth rate have helped a2 Milk Co.’s stock become the biggest gainer in New Zealand this year.】

item.title: 期权交易商因对关税持乐观态度而放弃美联储降息押注
item.description: 随着中美贸易战降温，以及最新的通胀数据显示关税影响受到抑制，交易员们正在匆忙撤出要求美联储降息的押注。【原文：Traders are rushing out of bets that call for Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts as the US-China trade war cools and the latest read on inflation reveals subdued tariff impact.】

item.title: 免费银行业务初创公司 Chime Financial 公开申请 IPO
item.description: Chime Financial Inc. 公开提交了首次公开募股申请，加入了越来越多的候选者行列，希望在典型的夏季平静期之前的短暂空窗期上市。【原文：Chime Financial Inc. filed publicly for an initial public offering, joining a growing number of candidates looking to go public in the brief window before the typical summer lull.】

item.title: 谷歌支持沙特人工智能基金，特朗普和 MBS 吹捧新投资
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯风险投资公司 STV 在谷歌的支持下成立了一个 1 亿美元的人工智能基金，这是美国总统唐纳德-特朗普访问沙特阿拉伯期间宣布的一揽子交易的一部分。【原文：Saudi Arabian venture capital firm STV launched a $100 million artificial intelligence fund with backing from Google as part of a package of deals announced during US President Donald Trump’s visit to the kingdom.】

item.title: 秘鲁在总理弹劾投票前出人意料地更换财政部长
item.description: 秘鲁不受欢迎的总统迪娜-博卢阿尔特出人意料地撤换了上任不到四个月的财政部长。【原文：Peru’s unpopular President Dina Boluarte surprisingly replaced her finance minister who had been on the job less than four months.】

item.title: 美国警告："在任何地方 "使用华为人工智能芯片都违反美国规则
item.description: 美国商务部发布指南称，在 "世界任何地方 "使用华为技术有限公司（Huawei Technologies Co.【原文：The Commerce Department issued guidance stating that the use of Huawei Technologies Co.’s Ascend artificial intelligence chips “anywhere in the world” violates the government’s export controls, escalating US efforts to curb technological advances in China.】

item.title: 前维京首席信息官的对冲基金首秀规模有望突破 10 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，前维京全球投资公司（Viking Global Investors）首席投资官宁进在第四季度开设其全球股票对冲基金时，预计将拥有至少 10 亿美元的客户现金。【原文：Former Viking Global Investors Chief Investment Officer Ning Jin is expected to have at least $1 billion of client cash when he opens his global stock hedge fund in the fourth quarter, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 乌克兰与美国签署关于执行矿产协议的补充文件
item.description: 乌克兰和美国签署了有关自然资源交易的补充协议，这是美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的一项关键要求，对于维持对基辅的军事援助至关重要。【原文：Ukraine and the US have signed additional agreements concerning a natural resources deal, a key demand of US President Donald Trump which is crucial for sustaining military aid for Kyiv.】

item.title: 提高盐税上限有可能削弱纽约州和加利福尼亚州的公用事业吸引力
item.description: 一项期待已久的众议院议案可能会削弱市政债券在一些州的吸引力，因为该议案将联邦扣除限额提高了两倍，达到了 3 万美元，即使该立法希望保持证券免税。【原文：A long-awaited House bill could dull the allure of municipal bonds in some states by tripling the federal deduction limit to $30,000, even as the legislation looks to keep the securities tax exempt.】

item.title: 特朗普重写人工智能芯片禁令遭英伟达和美国盟友抨击
item.description: 特朗普政府计划全面修订人工智能所用半导体的出口法规，废除拜登时代的做法，该做法曾招致美国盟友以及包括英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）和甲骨文公司（Oracle Corp. ）在内的公司的强烈反对。【原文：The Trump administration plans to overhaul regulations on the export of semiconductors used in artificial intelligence, tossing out a Biden-era approach that had drawn strenuous objections from US allies and companies including Nvidia Corp. and Oracle Corp.】

item.title: Airbnb 改版应用程序，推出奢华服务和精选旅游线路，推动住宿服务超越住宿服务
item.description: 在预告了一年多的房屋租赁以外的扩张计划之后，Airbnb 公司推出了一款经过全面改造的应用程序，不仅面向房主和旅行者，还面向私人厨师、发型师、培训师和旅游经营者，广泛提供他们的服务。【原文：After more than a year of teasing expansion plans beyond home rentals, Airbnb Inc. launched an overhauled app that’s not just for homeowners and travelers, but also for personal chefs, hair stylists, trainers and tour operators to offer their services widely.】

item.title: 纽约西区 9 号业主为曼哈顿赌场投入股权赌注
item.description: 索洛维耶夫集团（Soloviev Group）是一家房地产开发商，在曼哈顿西 57 街 9 号拥有一座大型办公楼。【原文：Soloviev Group, the real estate developer that owns a major office tower at 9 West 57th St. in Manhattan, is proposing a way for New York City residents to benefit from its potential casino project.】

item.title: 特朗普称美联储必须在通胀报告疲软后降低利率
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普援引一份不及预期的通胀报告，再次向美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔施压，要求其降低利率。【原文：President Donald Trump cited a softer-than-expected inflation report to again pressure Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell to lower interest rates.】

item.title: 鸡蛋更便宜，租车更贵：美国四月份通货膨胀情况
item.description: 受体育赛事、鸡蛋和其他日用品价格大幅下降的影响，美国 4 月份通胀率的增幅低于预期。【原文：US inflation rose by less than expected in April, helped by steep declines in prices for sporting events, eggs and other groceries.】

item.title: 企业告诉贸易法院，特朗普关税滥用了紧急状态法
item.description: 在一次可能对共和党经济议程产生重大影响的法庭听证会上，一群小企业敦促美国贸易法庭阻止唐纳德-特朗普总统的 "解放日 "全球关税措施。【原文：A group of small businesses urged the US trade court to block President Donald Trump’s “Liberation Day” global tariffs during a court hearing that could have a major impact on the Republican’s economic agenda.】

item.title: 斗牛犬 "前高盛银行家响应卡尼号召修复加拿大资源行业
item.description: 马克-卡尼第一次邀请蒂莫西-霍奇森（Timothy Hodgson）来渥太华时，他已经离开了高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：The first time Timothy Hodgson was asked by Mark Carney to come to Ottawa, he left behind an investment banking career at Goldman Sachs Group Inc. that had seen him climb the ranks to lead its Canadian business.】

item.title: 谷歌在 iPhone 全面改版前发布重大安卓系统重新设计方案
item.description: 谷歌发布了多年来最大的一次安卓移动操作系统更新，而在此之前几周，谷歌在该领域的最大竞争对手苹果公司预计将预览其经过全面改造的 iPhone 软件。【原文：Google unveiled the biggest update to its Android mobile operating system in years, weeks before its biggest competitor in the space, Apple Inc., is expected to give a preview of its overhauled iPhone software.】

item.title: 欧洲央行维勒鲁瓦称夏季可能再次降息
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，由于贸易紧张局势并未加剧该地区的通货膨胀，欧洲央行可能会在今年夏天之前再次降低借贷成本。【原文：The European Central Bank will probably lower borrowing costs again by the summer as trade tensions aren’t fueling inflation in the region, Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau said.】

item.title: 债务上限焦虑追踪：八月国债有溢价
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）向立法者表示，如果届时不提高或暂停联邦债务上限，美国很可能会在8月份耗尽其借贷权力，在此之后，国库券投资者开始围绕8月份到期的证券进行操作。他的警告使得票据利率上升。【原文：Treasury bills investors are starting to maneuver around those securities maturing in August after Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent told lawmakers that the US is likely to exhaust its borrowing authority that month if the federal debt ceiling isn’t raised or suspended by then. His warning has sent bill rates rising.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司首席执行官誓言 "勒紧裤腰带 "应对油价下跌
item.description: 巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）首席执行官玛格达-尚布里亚特（Magda Chambriard）表示，该石油生产商将勒紧裤腰带，以应对油价下跌带来的 "挑战"，同时继续专注于补充石油储备和增加深水油田的产量。【原文：Petrobras Chief Executive Officer Magda Chambriard said the oil producer will tighten its belts to navigate the “challenging” scenario of lower oil prices while keeping focus on replenishing oil reserves and increasing production at deep-water fields.】

item.title: 米莱将取消给 iPhone 贴上 2000 美元价格标签的关税
item.description: 哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）总统削减了使阿根廷成为世界上购买苹果手机最昂贵的国家之一的关税，兑现了几十年来实行保护主义政策的竞选承诺，向贸易开放经济。【原文：President Javier Milei cut tariffs that made Argentina one of the most expensive places in the world to buy iPhones after decades of protectionist policies, delivering on a campaign promise to open up the economy to trade.】

item.title: 对冲基金放弃就镍危机起诉LME
item.description: 一群对冲基金曾就 2022 年的镍危机起诉伦敦金属交易所，但在英国法院驳回了他们在不同诉讼中提出的类似论点后，他们放弃了法律诉讼。【原文：A group of hedge funds that sued the London Metal Exchange over the 2022 nickel crisis have dropped their legal action after similar arguments made in separate proceedings were rejected by UK courts.】

item.title: 特朗普即将访问阿联酋，OpenAI 正在权衡阿联酋数据中心交易
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，OpenAI 正在考虑在阿拉伯联合酋长国建设新的数据中心，这将大大扩大其在中东地区的业务范围。【原文：OpenAI is considering building new data center capacity in the United Arab Emirates that could significantly expand its footprint in the Middle East, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚商业游说团警告与中国达成协议的风险
item.description: 哥伦比亚商业游说团体警告说，古斯塔沃-彼得罗总统加入中国 "一带一路 "倡议的计划将给当地工业带来风险。【原文：Colombia’s business lobby warned of risks to local industry from President Gustavo Petro’s plan to join the Chinese Belt and Road Initiative.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯和 AMD 计划投资 100 亿美元部署人工智能设备
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯新成立的人工智能投资公司Humain正与芯片制造商Advanced Micro Devices公司合作，在未来五年内斥资100亿美元建设人工智能基础设施。【原文：Humain, Saudi Arabia’s new artificial intelligence investment company, is teaming up with chipmaker Advanced Micro Devices Inc. to spend $10 billion on AI infrastructure over the next five years.】

item.title: 英国乙醇工厂面临关闭，因为贸易协议促进了美国乙醇的流入
item.description: 由于从美国进口的免关税燃料增加，英国最大的乙醇生产商可能被迫停止生产。【原文：The UK’s biggest ethanol producers could be forced to halt production due to increased tariff-free imports of the fuel from the US.】

item.title: 独立音乐掮客将在行业技术革新中离职
item.description:

。【原文：

Jeremy Sirota, CEO of Merlin, will exit the company at the end of 2025
